name: FKT
short_description: This project provides an implementation of the FKT algorithm to count the number of perfect matchings in a planar graph.  The source code is written in the Forth language, requiring Gforth to run.  Computations can be perfored via a command line tool as well as via  a library usable with Gforth.
summary: Count perfect matchings in planar graphs.
